name: pastaknot_poc2021
description: A web application with tips for student meals

scripts.dev:db: docker run --name ${DB_NAME} -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=${DB_PASS} -e POSTGRES_USER=${DB_USER} -e POSTGRES_DB=${DB_NAME} -p ${DB_PORT}:${DB_PORT} -d postgres:alpine

author: Baptiste Barbotin, Amoz Pay, Arthur Nordmann, Victor Guyot, Ahmed Abouelleil, Jules Colas
